content: back in nyc and the city's vibe is electric  time to hustle up and find a new gig bc the job ain't waiting for me
raw_content: Just got back to the electric buzz of NYC! The city's energy is infectious, even if my job isn't waiting for me. Time to hustle and find a new start.

content: just turned 22 and it feels like a big deal, you know? spent the past few days going deep into AI research, dreaming up a digital buddy to hang out with.
raw_content: Had a quiet moment to reflect on turning 22 - feels like a milestone. Spent the last few days diving into AI research, thinking about creating a digital companion.
